Our Services

About Us

At IMORO we invite you to indulge in our heritage, Caribbean history and folklore of our ancestor’s way of using remedial ingredients from land and sea to naturally soothe and benefit the body. Fast forward to today where we at IMORO capture some of these elements in our award-winning line of Body and Spa products.

Read more

Testimonials

OMG!! I must admit I was skeptical, but the Orange Blossom Whip Butter is the BEST thing I have ever used in my hair!! It smells Amazing and it work exactly as you said it would. You have a brilliant product and I’m coming Barbados for my vacation next month, so I want to get a couple more products.
A. Charles-Williams (Trinidad)
IMORO products are awesome! I love that they are made using local and regional ingredients. The packaging is beautiful and hold it’s own compare to international brands. I am in love with the whip Triple Body Butters, they’re soo creamy and moisturising, I’ve used it on my heals and they are soo soft hours after applying. The Bath & Shower gels are awesome and don’t dry out your skin which I love.
S. Philips
We have been using IMORO’s professional Massage Oils, and Emulsifying scrubs for Pedicures and Body Scrubs in Chakra Spa and we are incredibly please with the quality of the products. The oils and scrubs have delicious scents that our Guest comment favorably on. An added bonus is that the products are made in Barbados which is appealing to bot local, regional and international Guests, I highly recommend giving these products a try.
N. Mahy (Spa Manager)
I am indeed using the Guava Lip balm every night before bed. I use it as a moisturiser. The lotion bar especially is so nice -I don’t use it too often so it can last
S. Daniels Moody (Belize)
As an avid sufferer of skin sensitivity, the only soaps that give me relief and don’t dry out my skin are IMORO's Artisan Bars, they leave my skin supple and soft after a shower while the subtle fragrances linger on. I always stock up on these by purchasing 10 at a time.
Fiona
